·ªû b√†i vi·∫øt n√†y, ch√∫ng ta s·∫Ω ti·∫øp t·ª•c v·ªõi ƒë·ªÅ t√†i ph√¢n t√≠ch d·ªØ li·ªáu th·ªùi gian trong Qu·∫£n l√≠ chu·ªói cung ·ª©ng.
L√Ω do m√¨nh ti·∫øp t·ª•c v·ªõi ch·ªß ƒë·ªÅ n√†y l√† v√¨ ·ªü b√†i vi·∫øt tr∆∞·ªõc ph·∫ßn x√¢y d·ª±ng m√¥ h√¨nh Machine Learning v·ªõi R v·∫´n ch∆∞a t·ªët, ho·∫∑c l√†m m√¨nh ch∆∞a c·∫£m th·∫•y ƒë√£ üòÖüòÖ . C√°c b·∫°n n√†o ch∆∞a ƒë·ªçc ho·∫∑c mu·ªën xem l·∫°i topic tr∆∞·ªõc th√¨ c√≥ th·ªÉ ·∫•n v√†o ƒë√¢y Time series model.
V√¨ v·∫≠y, ·ªü b√†i vi·∫øt n√†y, m√¨nh s·∫Ω t·∫≠p trung v√†o x√¢y d·ª±ng m√¥ h√¨nh Machine Learning ƒë·ªÉ ƒë∆∞a ra d·ª± b√°o t·ªët h∆°n. Ngo√†i ra, m√¨nh c≈©ng gi·ªõi thi·ªáu hai packages trong R c√≥ kh·∫£ nƒÉng x·ª≠ l√≠ t·ªët d·ªØ li·ªáu th·ªùi gian m√† kh√¥ng t·ªën nhi·ªÅu c√¥ng s·ª©c, ƒë√≥ l√† package timetk v√† modeltime.h2o .


ƒê·∫ßu ti√™n, v·∫´n l√† thao t√°c quen thu·ªôc trong R, ch√∫ng ta s·∫Ω t·∫£i d·ªØ li·ªáu v√† c√°c packages c·∫ßn thi·∫øt v√†o.


Code
#Call packages:
pacman::p_load(rio,
               here,
               janitor,
               tidyverse,
               dplyr,
               magrittr,
               lubridate,
               stringr
               )








T·∫£i th∆∞ vi·ªán



N·∫øu c√°c b·∫°n ch∆∞a c√≥ c√°c packages n√†y, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ t·∫£i xu·ªëng t·ª´ CRAN R b·∫±ng c√∫ ph√°p: `install.packages(*"name_of_package"*)`


Th√¥ng th∆∞·ªùng khi ph√¢n t√≠ch, vi·ªác x·ª≠ l√≠ d·ªØ li·ªáu kh√° t·ªën th·ªùi gian v√† c√¥ng s·ª©c. B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ xem ph·∫ßn code x·ª≠ l√≠ c·ªßa Frank Corrigan d∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y ƒë·ªÉ ti·∫øt ki·ªám th·ªùi gian.


Code
#Change to suitable class (I change the name dataset to product_demand to shortly write)
product_demand <-product_demand %>% 
    mutate(Date = as.Date(Date,format = "%Y/%m/%d"),
           Product_Category = as.factor(Product_Category))

product_demand$Order_Demand <- 
  gsub("[(]", "-", product_demand$Order_Demand)
product_demand$Order_Demand <- 
  gsub("[)]", "", product_demand$Order_Demand)
product_demand$Order_Demand <- 
  as.numeric(product_demand$Order_Demand)

#Then I will create a lot of cols contain year, month, week data and just select from 2012 to 2016:
product_demand <-product_demand %>%
  mutate(Month = month(Date),
         Year = year(Date),
         Week_day = wday(Date)) %>% 
  filter(Year %in% c(2016:2012) & Order_Demand > 0) 


#So I will calculate the total order demand divided by year and month:
daily_df<-product_demand %>% 
  group_by(Warehouse,Date) %>%   
  summarise(daily_demand = round(sum(Order_Demand,
                               na.rm = T))) %>% 
  ungroup()


Sau ƒë√≥, ch√∫ng ta t·∫£i d·ªØ li·ªáu v√†o R. N·∫øu b·∫°n n√†o ch∆∞a c√≥, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ ·∫•n v√†o n√∫t t·∫£i ph√≠a d∆∞·ªõi n√†y ƒë·ªÉ t·∫£i d·ªØ li·ªáu v·ªÅ th·ª±c h√†nh.


Code
library(downloadthis)
product_demand %>%
  download_this(
    output_name = "product_demand",
    output_extension = ".csv",
    button_label = "Download data",
    button_type = "warning",
    has_icon = TRUE,
    icon = "fa fa-save"
  )

2.1 Th√¥ng tin:
Package timetk l√† m·ªôt package n·∫±m trong h·ªá sinh th√°i modeltime ƒë·ªÉ ph√¢n t√≠ch v√† d·ª± b√°o chu·ªói th·ªùi gian. N√≥ c√≥ th·ªÉ d·ª± b√°o r·∫•t r·ªông v√† gi√∫p ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng tr√°nh m·∫•t nhi·ªÅu th·ªùi gian ƒë·ªÉ t√¨m hi·ªÉu, g·ªìm nh·ªØng ƒë·∫∑c ƒëi·ªÉm sau:

Nhi·ªÅu thu·∫≠t to√°n.

H·ªçc m√°y.

2.2 Th·ª±c h√†nh trong R:
·ªû b√†i tr∆∞·ªõc, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ th·∫•y ƒë·ªÉ hi·ªÉn th·ªã d·ªØ li·ªáu d·∫°ng th·ªùi gian trong R th√¨ ta c·∫ßn ph·∫£i chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi d·ªØ li·ªáu sang class zoo ho·∫∑c xts r·ªìi m·ªõi d√πng package dygraphs ƒë·ªÉ hi·ªÉn th·ªã d·ªØ li·ªáu.
Trong timetk, ta kh√¥ng c·∫ßn chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi m√† ch·ªâ c·∫ßn d·ªØ li·ªáu ·ªü d·∫°ng b·∫£ng l√† c√≥ th·ªÉ t·∫°o ƒë∆∞·ª£c bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì. Ngo√†i ra, b·∫°n ho√†n to√†n d·ªÖ d√†ng t·∫°o theo nh√≥m b·∫±ng c√°ch th√™m h√†m group_by() ·ªü tr∆∞·ªõc.






Th√™m s·ª± t∆∞∆°ng t√°c:



H√†m plot_time_series() s·∫Ω hi·ªÉn th·ªã d·ªØ li·ªáu d·∫°ng ƒë∆∞·ªùng line nh∆∞ c√°c bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì th√¥ng th∆∞·ªùng.
B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ th√™m ƒë·ªëi s·ªë .interactive = TRUE ƒë·ªÉ ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng t∆∞∆°ng t√°c d∆∞·ªõi d·∫°ng HTML

title: Auto Machine Learning
text:
2.3 Chu·∫©n b·ªã d·ªØ li·ªáu:


Code
library(timetk)
daily_df %>% 
  group_by(Warehouse) %>% 
  plot_time_series(Date, 
                 daily_demand,
                 .facet_ncol  = 2,
                 .smooth      = F,
                 .interactive = TRUE)






Nh∆∞ bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì tr√™n, ta c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë√°nh gi√° r·∫±ng:

Nh√† kho A: nhu c·∫ßu ƒë·∫∑t h√†ng c·ªßa kh√°ch ·ªü m·ª©c th·∫•p nh·∫•t trong 4 nh√† kho. Ch·ªâ c√≥ cu·ªëi nƒÉm 2015 l√† ƒë·ªôt ng·ªôt tƒÉng cao, kh·∫£ nƒÉng l√† nh√† kho n√†y ƒëang b√π h√†ng v√†o ƒë·ª£t sales cu·ªëi nƒÉm cho c√°c kho kh√°c ƒë·ªÉ tr√°nh outstock.
Nh√† kho J: ta th·∫•y nhu c·∫ßu ƒë·∫∑t h√†ng c√≥ m·ª©c ƒë·ªô bi·∫øn ƒë·ªông cao. V√¨ v·∫≠y, nh√† kho n√†y kh√¥ng ch·ªâ c·∫ßn ph·ªëi h·ª£p gi·ªØa vi·ªác forecasting v√† x√¢y d·ª±ng nhi·ªÅu plan backup ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o h√†ng kh√¥ng outstock c≈©ng nh∆∞ gi·∫£m chi ph√≠ t·ªìn kho (inventory cost).
Nh√† kho C v√† S: nhu c·∫ßu ƒë·∫∑t h√†ng c√≥ v·∫ª ·ªïn ƒë·ªãnh h∆°n ch·ªâ tr·ª´ v√†i ng√†y nhu c·∫ßu tƒÉng cao ƒë·ªôt bi·ªÉn.

Sau khi ph√¢n t√≠ch, ch√∫ng ta s·∫Ω ƒëi t·ªõi ph·∫ßn x√¢y d·ª±ng m√¥ h√¨nh. B∆∞·ªõc ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n v·∫´n l√† chia b·ªô d·ªØ li·ªáu ·ªü t·ªâ l·ªá 7:3 th√†nh training set v√† testing set. ·ªû ƒë√¢y, ta s·∫Ω s·ª≠ d·ª•ng c√°c h√†m sau ƒë·ªÉ:
ƒê·∫ßu ti√™n, ch√∫ng ta c≈©ng chia d·ªØ li·ªáu th√†nh 2 b·ªô b·∫±ng h√†m time_series_split().
Sau ƒë√≥, t·∫°o bi·ªÉu ƒë·ªì b·∫±ng:

tk_time_series_cv_plan(): Chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi d·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë√£ resample th√†nh d·∫°ng b·∫£ng.
plot_time_series_cv_plan(): Hi·ªÉn th·ªã d·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë√£ resample th·ªùi gian.



Code
splits <- time_series_split(daily_df, 
                            assess = "12 month",
                            cumulative = TRUE)

splits %>%
  tk_time_series_cv_plan() %>%
  plot_time_series_cv_plan(Date, 
                           daily_demand, 
                           .interactive = T)

title: Auto Machine Learning
text:
2.4 Chia d·ªØ li·ªáu:
Ti·∫øp theo, ch√∫ng ta s·∫Ω x√¢y d·ª±ng m√¥ h√¨nh v·ªõi m√¥ h√¨nh v·ªõi package {recipe}. ƒêi·ªÅu ƒë·∫∑c bi·ªát l√† trong R package {timetk} c√≥ k·∫øt h·ª£p v·ªõi {recipe}.
C√°c b∆∞·ªõc bao g·ªìm:

B1: T·∫°o ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng d·∫°ng class recipe() v·ªõi d·ªØ li·ªáu t·ª´ training set.
B2: S·ª≠ d·ª•ng h√†m step_timeseries_signature() ƒë·ªÉ chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi t·ª´ d·ªØ li·ªáu ng√†y ho·∫∑c gi·ªù th√†nh nhi·ªÅu t√≠nh nƒÉng c√≥ th·ªÉ h·ªó tr·ª£ cho vi·ªác x√¢y d·ª±ng m√¥ h√¨nh h·ªçc m√°y v·ªõi d·ªØ li·ªáu chu·ªói th·ªùi gian.
B3: T√°ch b·ªô d·ªØ li·ªáu th√†nh training set v√† testing set c√πng v·ªõi c√°c ƒë·∫∑c t√≠nh ƒë√£ t·∫°o ·ªü tr√™n b·∫±ng h√†m prep() v√† bake().



Code
library(rsample)


Warning: package 'rsample' was built under R version 4.2.3


Code
library(recipes)
recipe_spec <- recipe(daily_demand ~ ., 
                      data = training(splits)) %>%
    step_timeseries_signature(Date) 

train_tbl <- training(splits) %>% bake(prep(recipe_spec), .)

test_tbl  <- testing(splits) %>% bake(prep(recipe_spec), .)


B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ th·∫•y khi √°p d·ª•ng k·∫øt h·ª£p c√¥ng th·ª©c prep() v√† bake() th√¨ nhi·ªÅu c·ªôt m·ªõi ƒë√£ ƒë∆∞·ª£c th√™m v√†o t·ª´ t√≠nh nƒÉng c·ªßa ‚Äúng√†y‚Äù. ƒê√¢y l√† nh·ªØng t√≠nh nƒÉng ch√∫ng ta c√≥ th·ªÉ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng trong c√°c m√¥ h√¨nh h·ªçc m√°y c·ªßa m√¨nh.

title: Auto Machine Learning
text:
2.5 X√¢y d·ª±ng m√¥ h√¨nh:
·ªû ƒë√¢y, ch√∫ng ta s·ª≠ d·ª•ng package modeltime.h2o. N√≥ s·∫Ω hu·∫•n luy·ªán v√† ki·ªÉm ch·ª©ng ch√©o (cross-validates) nhi·ªÅu m√¥ h√¨nh h·ªçc m√°y v√† h·ªçc s√¢u (XGBoost GBM, GLM, R·ª´ng ng·∫´u nhi√™n, GBM‚Ä¶), sau ƒë√≥ hu·∫•n luy·ªán hai m√¥ h√¨nh Stacked Ensembled, m·ªôt trong t·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c m√¥ h√¨nh v√† m·ªôt trong nh·ªØng m√¥ h√¨nh t·ªët nh·∫•t c·ªßa m·ªói lo·∫°i. Cu·ªëi c√πng, m√¥ h√¨nh t·ªët nh·∫•t ƒë∆∞·ª£c l·ª±a ch·ªçn.
V√¨ n√≥ kh√¥ng c√≥ s·∫µn tr√™n CRAN n√™n b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ t·∫£i theo c√∫ ph√°p d∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y v√† th√¥ng tin th√™m ·ªü ƒë√¢y (Matt Dancho 2024).











T·∫£i package Modeltime H2O:



devtools::install_github("business-science/modeltime.h2o")


Tr∆∞·ªõc khi s·ª≠ d·ª•ng modeltime.h2o, c·∫ßn ph·∫£i k·∫øt n·ªëi v·ªõi d·∫°ng H2O th√¥ng qua h√†m h2o.init().


Code
h2o.init(
    nthreads = -1,
    ip       = 'localhost',
    port     = 54321

Code
library(modeltime.h2o)
library(parsnip)
## T·∫°o ra c√°c ti√™u ch√≠ cho m√¥ h√¨nh:
model_spec <- automl_reg(mode = 'regression') %>%
    set_engine(
         engine                     = 'h2o',
         max_runtime_secs           = 5, 
         max_runtime_secs_per_model = 3,
         max_models                 = 3,
         nfolds                     = 5,
         exclude_algos              = c("DeepLearning"),
         verbosity                  = NULL,
         seed                       = 786
    ) 

## D√πng c√°c ti√™u ch√≠ ƒë√≥ ƒë·ªÉ x√¢y d·ª±ng train m√¥ h√¨nh:

    fit(daily_demand ~ ., 
        data = train_tbl)

Theo m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh, m√¥ h√¨nh c√≥ gi√° tr·ªã trung b√¨nh v·ªÅ sai s·ªë th·∫•p nh·∫•t s·∫Ω ƒë∆∞·ª£c h·ªçn v√† tr·∫£ v·ªÅ ·ªü d·∫°ng class H20AutoML. ƒê·ªÉ bi·∫øt th√™m th√¥ng tin, h√£y b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ d√πng c√∫ ph√°p ?h2o.automl ·ªü console.
Ngo√†i ra, gi·∫£ s·ª≠ b·∫°n ch·ªâ c·∫ßn t√™n c√°c m√¥ h√¨nh t·ªët nh·∫•t x·∫øp t·ª´ tr√™n xu·ªëng t·ª´ R, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ d√πng h√†m automl_leaderbord ƒë·ªÉ xu·∫•t ra.

Cu·ªëi c√πng, ta s·∫Ω d√πng m√¥ h√¨nh t·ªët nh·∫•t ƒë∆∞·ª£c nh·∫Øc ·ªü tr√™n ƒë·ªÉ d·ª± ƒëo√°n d·ªØ li·ªáu b·∫±ng h√†m predict.

title: Auto Machine Learning
text:
2.7 ƒê√°nh gi√° m√¥ h√¨nh:
Sau khi ƒë√£ d·ª± ƒëo√°n, vi·ªác quan tr·ªçng cu·ªëi c√πng l√† ƒë√°nh gi√° ƒë·ªô t·ªët c·ªßa m√¥ h√¨nh v·ª´a train. V√† package modeltime c√≥ cung c·∫•p th√™m h√†m:

modeltime_table(): chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng class h2o v·ªÅ d·∫°ng d·ªØ li·ªáu b·∫£ng.
modeltime_calibrate(): h√†m ƒë·ªÉ ƒë√°nh gi√° m√¥ h√¨nh ƒë∆∞·ª£c x√¢y d·ª±ng.
modeltime_forecast(): h√†m ƒë·ªÉ d·ª± ƒëo√°n gi√° tr·ªã d·ª±a tr√™n m√¥ h√¨nh ƒë∆∞·ª£c g√°n.



Code
## Chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng th√†nh d·∫°ng b·∫£ng ƒë·ªÉ d·ªÖ d√†ng l·∫•y d·ªØ li·ªáu:

    model_fitted
) 

## ƒê√°nh gi√° d·ªØ li·ªáu b·∫±ng h√†m modeltime_calibrate v√† hi·ªÉn th·ªã gi√° tr·ªã d·ª± ƒëo√°n:

Ho·∫°t ƒë·ªông refit nghƒ©a l√† s·ª≠ d·ª•ng m√¥ h√¨nh ƒë√£ ƒë∆∞·ª£c train v√† ch·ª©a t·∫•t c·∫£ d·ªØ li·ªáu m√¨nh c√≥ v√† d√πng n√≥ ƒë·ªÉ d·ª± ƒëo√°n gi√° tr·ªã cho m·ªôt kho·∫£ng th·ªùi gian s·∫Øp t·ªõi.


Code
## G·ªôp d·ªØ li·ªáu t·ª´ training set v√† testing set th√†nh m·ªôt:
data_prepared_tbl <- bind_rows(train_tbl, test_tbl)


## T·∫°o th√™m c√°c h√†ng cho d·ªØ li·ªáu s·∫Øp t·ªõi. V√≠ d·ª• ta c·∫ßn trong 6 th√°ng th√¨ h√†m s·∫Ω t·∫°o th√™m 365*4 = 1460 h√†ng:
future_tbl <- data_prepared_tbl %>%
    group_by(Warehouse) %>%
    future_frame(.length_out = "6 months") %>%
    ungroup()

## T·∫°o th√™m c√°c ƒë·∫∑c t√≠nh kh√°c c·ªßa d·ªØ li·ªáu gi·ªëng nh∆∞ tr√™n ƒë√£ l√†m:
